0011001111110011 0000111000010110 1 -> sum: 0100001000001010, cout: 0
1110100000010101 0010111110001001 1 -> sum: 0001011110011111, cout: 1
1000001000001111 1000011101110111 1 -> sum: 0000100110000111, cout: 1
0101110001000110 1111010100011100 0 -> sum: 0101000101100010, cout: 1
0100011101110010 1011010000010000 1 -> sum: 1111101110000011, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0000000000000001 0000000000000010 0 -> sum: 0000000000000011, cout: 0
